input.sentences: [female] is at a book store they are having a sale on old books .
there is a statue of man sitting down reading a book .
her daughter [female] goes through some books she might want to buy .
[female] is having a hard time picking just one book .
after buying the book she looks for a place to sit down and read .
output.sentences: The woman found the novel she was reading incredibly interesting.
It depicted a warehouse full of unique artifacts, such as bronze men.
The literary work inspired the woman's daughter to begin searching for more books
There were so many stories to sift through that she needed more help.
They decided all that knowledge was best shared with everyone, and handed the books out to more women.
